tool_description: Analyzes company financial health and performance metrics to assess prospect viability and purchasing power for strategic sales targeting.

company_name.description: Name of the company to analyze

company_ticker.description: Stock ticker symbol if publicly traded

analysis_period.description: Time period for analysis: quarter, year, three_years

metrics_focus.description: Specific metrics to focus on: revenue, growth, profitability, debt, cash_flow

include_benchmarks.description: Whether to include industry benchmark comparisons

error_messages: Company financial data not available: No financial information found for the specified company
Invalid analysis period: Use quarter, year, or three_years
Invalid metrics focus: Supported metrics are revenue, growth, profitability, debt, cash_flow
Insufficient data: Not enough financial data available for meaningful analysis
Private company limitations: Limited financial data available for private companies
usage: Provide company name and optionally ticker symbol. Choose analysis period and specific financial metrics to focus on. Results include financial health assessment and growth indicators.

key_metrics.description: List of key financial metrics and values

risk_assessment.description: Financial risk level: low, medium, high
